channel.title: Documentation on OpenEncoder
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on OpenEncoder

item.title: Preset file format reference
item.description: contribute Share your presets with others, you can contribute presets to GitHub repository Example of preset file { "title": "H264 for 4K", "type": "video", "format": "mp4", "author": "Evan Hsu", "parameters": { "c:v": "libx264", "pix_fmt": "yuv420p", "s": "3840x2160", "c:a": "aac", "b:a": "320k" } } title Preset title type Preset category name format Output file format, File extension author The name of the author of the preset file
